Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to a real property tax exemption for property owned by active duty service members
Summary: Provides a real property tax exemption for property owned by active duty service members of the armed forces of the United States in taxing jurisdictions which elect to provide a veterans exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a property tax exemption for active duty service members of the armed forces of the United States
